article_title: Why Ben Carson Would Make a Terrible CEO for America
article_text:
The 9 Coolest Toys For Your Kids This Christmas, Just in Time for Last-Minute Shoppers

Toys, toys, and more toys. If you're confused about what to get your kids for Christmas, check out this list of the coolest playthings. There's something for every budget.

article_metadata.description: Ben Carson's poll numbers are declining amid concerns over his foreign policy knowledge, but there are other issues to think about before we elect him the next CEO of America.
article_metadata.author: Valerie Young

og.description: Ben Carson's poll numbers are declining amid concerns over his foreign policy knowledge, and that's not the only reason voters may want to think twice before electing him president.
og.title: Why Ben Carson Would Make a Terrible CEO for America
